attributes.review: i really thought that downloading this app would allow me to be a part of the movement to make america great again. but alas, downloading this app has turned my skin completely orange and i got radioactive burns. and the worst part is that my orange skin is irreversible where as these burns are treatable.

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible it took months to download and it played music that brought a biker gang of rednecks to my house. They then proceeded to shoot my cat and take my child. DO NOT download
